name: Chasing Halo:Iron Storm
description:
Chasing halo:Iron Storm is a military vehicle game.It collects resources to forge combat vehicles,have 18vs18 battlefields and have 90 troops to compete in the same field.It uses strategies of team to gain an immersive PVP experience.

competition of strategically getting treasure
You can choose many tanks,operate a wealth of props and terrain, predict the location of supply boxes and airdrop boxes,and incarnate elite soldiers to participate in the battle.
In addition to facing the competition of other players,it will also fight with the enemy troops stationed in the theater.



Ace tanks
The main battle tank has firm armor and powerful artillery.
Armored vehicles have excellent mobility and can quickly penetrate and spy on the enemy.
Artillery has excellent firepower,can bombard from long range.It has excellent concealment,which can safely targeted attack.
Rocket cars have powerful bursts and sufficient ammunition,and can carry out continuous fire suppression.



upgrade talents and modify
You can not only refit equipment,talents, props and ammunition before fighting, but also gain in-game growth through fierce fighting.



make a reasonable match according to rank
You will make a reasonable match according to your rank and the level of vehicle, and enter different battlefields randomly.Different playing methods will make you experience different fun.



[breal armor structure[/b]
Damage to the armor, modules, members and internal structure of the vehicle will affect the tank control. If the ammunition rack is destroyed, it will be directly exploded. You will experience the real tank combat experience in the game.



play freely in the war zone
The natural scenery and cultural scene are beautiful and pleasant, and the terrain is complex, which provides the greatest degree of freedom for the fierce tank battle.



A vast,fictitious history
El Nino phenomenon has changed the global environment.The outbreak of the crisis of intelligent machinery has reduced the living space of human beings.This seems to be a test for mankind.You need to lead mankind to protect the territory and improve the environment.
